<div class="col-md-10 col-xs-12 col-md-offset-1 tablon">
  <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 bord-sepa"></div>
    <div id="carousel-example-generic" class="carousel slide" data-ride="carousel">
        <ol class="carousel-indicators">
          <li data-target="#carousel-example-generic" data-slide-to="0" class="active"></li>
          <li data-target="#carousel-example-generic" data-slide-to="1" class=""></li>
          <li data-target="#carousel-example-generic" data-slide-to="2" class=""></li>
        </ol>
        <div class="carousel-inner" role="listbox">
          <div class="item active">
            <img data-src="holder.js/1140x500/auto/#777:#555/text:First slide" alt="First slide [1140x500]" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true">
          </div>
          <div class="item">
            <img data-src="holder.js/1140x500/auto/#666:#444/text:Second slide" alt="Second slide [1140x500]" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true">
          </div>
          <div class="item">
            <img data-src="holder.js/1140x500/auto/#555:#333/text:Third slide" alt="Third slide [1140x500]" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," data-holder-rendered="true">
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 bord-sepa"></div>
    <div class="col-md-8 col-xs-12 abajo">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 imagen-col"></div>
        {{#each this}}
          <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 bord2">
            <div class="col-md-3 col-xs-3 center">{{fecha}}</div>
            <div class="col-md-6 col-xs-6">{{titulo}}</div>
            <div class="col-md-3 col-xs-3">
              {{#if2 url}}
                <a href="/noticias/{{url}}">Leer Más</a></div>
               {{else}}
                <a href="/noticias/id/{{id}}">Leer Más</a></div>
              {{/if2 }}
          </div>
        {{/each}}
    </div>

    <div class="col-md-4 col-xs-12">
      <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 imagen-torneven"></div>
    </div>
     <div class="col-md-12 col-xs-12 ranking">

    </div>
</div>
